title: 尋日加拿大既遊行人數已出：超過 50 萬

replies.msg:
«Près d’un demi-million» de manifestants dans les rues de Montréal

(Montréal) Quelques centaines de milliers de personnes ont défilé dans les rues du centre-ville de Montréal vendredi après-midi pour réclamer des actions concrètes afin de lutter contre les changements climatiques.

Mis à jour le 27 septembre 2019 à 19h55
Publié le 27 septembre 2019 à 14h40

https://www.lapresse.ca/actualites/environnement/201909/27/01-5243114-pres-dun-demi-million-de-manifestants-dans-les-rues-de-montreal.php

PRC always take advantage of their population.
When they show strength, they mention the high tier population.
When they need help, they mention the low tier population (and no efficient policy to help those population).
PRC claim themselves as a developing country, but showing the power of a developed country.
This is not fair to the world.

1) The World’s Top 3 Emitters Contribute 14 Times the Emissions of the Bottom 100
The top three greenhouse gas emitters— China, the European Union and the United States—contribute more than half of total global emissions, while the bottom 100 countries only account for 3.5 percent.1 Collectively, the top 10 emitters account for nearly three-quarters of global emissions. The world can’t successfully tackle the climate change challenge without significant action from these countries.
